Hamza's toolkit

Functions in the package:

- Mycsvreader: allows to import all csv file of a designated folder
- Savecsv: allows to export a dataset as a csv file
- Readexcelmulti: allows to import all the sheets of an excel file
- Drawname: Plot the evolution of a name given in France
- mDrawnames: Draw a plot comparing the evolutions of multiple names in France
